entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is a location mentioned in the text as the target of their attempted assault. It is described as a place where they will be using Hermione's actual wand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is part of the group attempting to assault Gringotts. She is mentioned as being frightened of her own wand and feeling that it doesn't work properly for her.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is part of the group attempting to assault Gringotts. He is mentioned as trying to reassure Hermione about using her own wand.

entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: Malfoy Manor is a location where Hermione was wearing a sweater from which a black hair was plucked.

entities.name: hermione's wand
entities.description: Hermione's wand is an object that is mentioned as being used by Hermione. It is described as feeling 'all wrong' and not working properly for her.

entities.name: blackthorn wand
entities.description: The blackthorn wand is an object that is mentioned as being disliked by Harry. It is described as not working as well as his own wand.

entities.name: glass phial
entities.description: A glass phial is an object where a single long, coarse black hair was placed.

relationships.description: Harry tries to reassure Hermione about using her own wand.
Hermione dislikes the blackthorn wand and feels that it doesn't work properly for her.
Harry also dislikes the blackthorn wand, which he felt didn't work as well as his own wand.
A single long, coarse black hair was placed in a glass phial.
